briefdescription.para: ak8975 I2C device identifier

ak8975 I2C status 1 register

ak8975 I2C x-axis high-byte data register

ak8975 I2C y-axys sensitivity adjustment value register
ak8975 I2C z-axys sensitivity adjustment value register
ak8975 I2C device identifier (static)
ak8975 100us when mode is changed
ak8975 1ms when checking data ready in a loop
ak8975 9ms max for single measurement
Gets the sensitivity adjusted axis value.

briefdescription.para: Gets the sensitivity adjusted axes values.

parameterdescription.para: AK8975 magnetic axes data with sensitivity adjustments applied.

memberdef.name: ak8975_i2c_read_from

briefdescription.para: AK8975 I2C read from register address transaction. This is a write and then read process.

parameterdescription.para: AK8975 register address to read from.
Length of buffer to store results from read transaction.

memberdef.name: ak8975_i2c_write_byte_to

briefdescription.para: AK8975 I2C write byte to register address transaction.

parameterdescription.para: AK8975 register address to write to.

briefdescription.para: Writes the operating mode to AK8975.
Writes the self-test control state (true or false) to AK8975.

parameterdescription.para: Self-test control state setting, true to enable self-test.

briefdescription.para: Reads uncompensated magnetic axes data from AK8975.

parameterdescription.para: AK8975 uncompensated magnetic axes data (X, Y, Z).
